duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the operations of 6-10 convenience stores and work with the retail operations team on broader operational issues.
Lead a successful operation by being a dedicated team player and fostering a positive work environment.
Work independently with a strong work ethic and a desire to provide outstanding customer service to customers and employees.
Manage and optimize inventory, sales, and customer service processes at each convenience store.
Collaborate with the retail operations team to address operational challenges and ensure the smooth functioning of all stores.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Retail Management, or a related field (Master's preferred)
